title: 139: Love Is Blind Recap: Episode 7 & 8 (Meeting The Families & The Ick)
itunes:title: 139: Love Is Blind Recap: Episode 7 & 8 (Meeting The Families & The Ick)
description:
The Broads attempt to cover the action packed episode 7 & 8 because it is FULL of drama. They chat about the meetings of MOST all of the families, an incredibly awkward Barnett/Jessica conversation, wedding dress/tux nightmare shopping, some intimate moments with the couples, and much more!
***Reminder: we are watching this show episode by episode as we recap - though the show has been out for a long time, we do not know how anything ends so please no *SPOILERS*. Theses are our in real time takes:)
*JOIN US FOR OUR FIRST RECAP OF "THE BACHELOR: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART” TUESDAY APRIL 14TH AND LOVE IS BLIND FINALE RECAP (ep 9,10&11) THURSDAY APRIL 16TH
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom 
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
